5678.description: n8n web UI (accessed via Traefik on port 443)
5678.label: Web UI (Direct Access)

/home/node/.n8n.description: Persistent n8n data (workflow definitions, credentials, etc.)
/home/node/.n8n.label: Share

N8N_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol - use https when behind Proxy like traefik, else http
N8N_PROTOCOL.label: Protocol

WEBHOOK_URL.description: Public webhook URL for n8n. (Use N8N_HOST value.)
WEBHOOK_URL.label: Webhook URL

N8N_SECURE_COOKIE.description: Set to false if having cookie issues behind e.g. traefik, else set to true
N8N_SECURE_COOKIE.label: Secure Cookie

N8N_EDITOR_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the n8n editor (e.g. https://n8n.domain.tld)
N8N_EDITOR_BASE_URL.label: Editor Base URL

N8N.more_info: Official Docker image: n8nio/n8n. Access via https://n8n.kautz.cloud
